about_the_game:
Get a customization pack to increase the customization possibilities you have for your vehicles!

Each customization pack you own gives you access to at least 20 new paint textures of varying styles, 4 new colors, and 1 new paint command to be used in any paint job you create, also increasing the maximum metallicness and smoothness.

Which exact textures and colors you get from each pack is unique for each player. This pack may not unlock the textures that were used in the screenshots.
detailed_description:
Get a customization pack to increase the customization possibilities you have for your vehicles!

Each customization pack you own gives you access to at least 20 new paint textures of varying styles, 4 new colors, and 1 new paint command to be used in any paint job you create, also increasing the maximum metallicness and smoothness.

Which exact textures and colors you get from each pack is unique for each player. This pack may not unlock the textures that were used in the screenshots.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04, CentOS 7 or compatible
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better

name: Turbo Sliders Unlimited - Customization Pack 11

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Adds lots of customization options to your paint jobs: at least 20 paint textures of various styles, 4 new colors, 1 more paint command, and increased maximum metallicness and smoothness.
